doc:
Melody Perkins https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Melody_Perkins 0 Melody Perkins (born January 28, 1974) is an American actress, model and dancer. She is known for her regular role as the villainess later turned heroine Astronema in Power Rangers in Space, and became the Pink Ranger in Power Rangers Lost Galaxy. Melody_Perkins ( born January_28_,_1974 ) is an_American_actress_,_model_and_dancer . She is_known for her_regular_role as the_villainess later turned heroine_Astronema in Power_Rangers in Space , and became the_Pink_Ranger in Power_Rangers_Lost_Galaxy .
